folder: Park Avenue & Portland Avenue (North), Brooklyn, NY
text:
93 to 105 Park Avenue, north side, between North Portland Avenue and North Oxford Street, viewing east toward the latter. View 2 shows the same group of houses, seen from North Oxford Street. The demolition on the south side of the avenue is for 'Fort Greene Houses.

P. L. Sperr
April 12, 1941
Views 1, 2
